mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARD WHERE STATUS='Y'
SELECT * FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER M ON(B.MEMBER_ID = M.MEMBER_ID) JOIN NORMALNOTICE A ON(B.BOARD_NO = A.BOARD_NO) WHERE B.STATUS = 'Y' AND B.BOARD_TYPE = '일반공지' ORDER BY B.BOARD_NO DESC

SELECT B.BOARD_NO, B.MEMBER_ID, B.TITLE, B.CONTENT, B.WRITER, B.ENROLL_DATE, B.STATUS, B.BOARD_TYPE, B.COUNT, N.WRITE_DEPT, N.DEADLINE FROM BOARD B JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON(B.MEMBER_ID = E.EMPLOYEE_NO) JOIN E_DEPARTMENT D ON(E.EDEPT_CODE = D.EDEPT_CODE) JOIN NORMALNOTICE N ON(B.BOARD_NO = N.BOARD_NO) WHERE B.BOARD_NO = #{boardNo} AND B.STATUS = 'Y'
